Specification: Crafted by Burbank to capture positive Feng Sui across a lavish 55 squares (approx.), this 5-bedroom 5-bathroom residence offers all the luxury of a modern mansion.  Positioned on the high side of the street for magnificent mountain viewing, this exclusively detailed home puts you in the prized school catchment for Mount View Primary and Glen Waverley Secondary College (STSA), with private education at nearby Wesley College and Caulfield Grammar.,	A spectacular 5m high entrance hall welcomes the family home in dramatic fashion, with polished porcelain tiling carrying you across the ground floor, Victorian Ash timber drawing you up the staircase and durable bamboo floors underfoot in the bedrooms.,	North facing to infuse the entire home with beautiful natural light, the master bedroom enjoys bright ambience behind double glazed windows and features its own ensuite, walk in robe and convenient ground floor position for intergenerational living or guests.,	The expansive floor plan set over two light-filled levels offers a dedicated home cinema, an open plan kitchen and living wing alongside the outdoor room (which can be fully closed) and a grand rumpus with terrace access to take in spectacular district outlooks all the way to The Dandenong Ranges.,	A stylish, practical kitchen is smartly designed with a waterfall stone central bench, soft close drawers, and a butler's pantry with Technika double oven and rangehood to serve as a private cooking station.,	Parents can enjoy beautiful parkland scenery from their palatial master suite which overlooks Hinkler Reserve, with the promise of blissful retreat from a spa ensuite with twin basins and an oversized shower.,	Window shutters, central heating and refrigerated cooling, ducted vacuum system, laundry chute, electric front gates, double garage with internal access and a low maintenance garden with a gazebo sun deck add to the exclusive credentials of this fully featured family wonderland.,	This is an exciting opportunity to embrace contemporary living at the heart of Glen Waverley, close enough to The Glen, GWSC and Mount View Primary to walk, surrounded by parks, schools, transport connections and the world class dining and retail precinct which has made the $500 million upgrade of The Glen such an attraction.
